main event: On December 7, 1958, near Incirlik Air Force Base in Turkey, a bright object appeared to change color from red to blue to white, exhibited erratic movements, and disappeared before others could arrive at the scene.
interesting points: The object appeared to be controlled and moved in an erratic manner, changing color and disappearing quickly.
No photographs or recordings were obtained of the object.
The witnesses were unable to determine the actual nature of the object due to its erratic movements and disappearance.
The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes, and the object was estimated to be about the size of a coin held at arm's length.
The report includes witness statements from Airman First Class Walter Wentker and Master Sergeant George Barker, Jr., who both observed the bright object in the sky over Incirlik Air Base.
sighted object: A bright object in the sky changing color from red to blue to white
witnesses: Airman First Class and Master Sergeant from the 1707th Radio Transmitter Squadron
